name: airbud
description: node.js request wrapper adding support for retries, exponential back-off, fixture serving, JSON
author: Kevin van Zonneveld <kevin@vanzonneveld.net>

scripts.release: npm version ${SEMANTIC:-patch} -m "Release %s" && npm run build && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run build && env DEBUG=Airbud:* mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script --require "coffee-script/register" --reporter spec test/ --grep "${GREP}"
